original_text: or, without seeing them, drops on them a stone heavy enough to kill them, and they die, then since that other person was not an enemy and no harm was intended,
korean_text: 보지 못하고 사람을 죽일 만한 돌을 던져서 죽였을 때에 이는 악의도 없고 해하려 한 것도 아닌즉

sentences.original_text: drops on them a stone heavy enough to kill them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 죽일 만큼 무거운 돌을 떨어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: then since that other person was not an enemy
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 다른 사람이 원수가 아니었고
